items.name: Edo Magic Palace
items.short_description: Step into a world of wonder where local Edo myths meet breathtaking illusions. Expect disappearing acts, levitation, and mind-bending tricks that will leave children spellbound.
items.address: 15 Oba Akenzua Rd, GRA, Benin City

items.name: Royal Illusion Theater
items.short_description: A grand stage for fantastical feats! Enjoy a dazzling array of magical performances, from card tricks to grand escapes, designed to amaze young audiences and spark their imagination.
items.address: Opposite Adesuwa Grammar School, Sapele Rd, Benin City

items.name: Mystical Wonders Hall
items.short_description: Experience close-up magic and interactive illusions that bring children into the heart of the mystery. Witness objects vanish and reappear, right before your eyes.
items.address: 40 Airport Road, Oredo, Benin City

items.name: Sorcerer's Den
items.short_description: A quaint spot for younger kids to enjoy simple yet charming magic tricks and learn a few easy illusions themselves. Perfect for a first introduction to the world of magic.
items.address: Ugbowo Express Road, By Uselu Market, Benin City

items.name: Edo Kids Fun Land
items.short_description: A vibrant amusement park tailored for children, featuring gentle rides, bouncy castles, and a soft play area. It's a haven of laughter and excitement for all ages.
items.address: Along Akpakpava Road, Benin City

items.name: Palm Tree Play Park
items.short_description: An outdoor theme park with a jungle theme, offering slides, swings, and climbing frames under the shade of lush palm trees. Ideal for active children.
items.address: 12 Adesuwa Road, GRA, Benin City

items.name: Rainbow Adventure City
items.short_description: A colorful indoor theme park featuring ball pits, obstacle courses, and mini-rides, ensuring fun regardless of the weather. Perfect for toddlers and young children.
items.address: Ekenwan Road, Opposite Army Barracks, Benin City

items.name: Beninville Junior World
items.short_description: A charming miniature world where kids can explore scaled-down versions of city buildings, drive mini cars, and engage in imaginative role-play activities.
items.address: Off Isihor Road, Near Igbinedion University, Benin City

items.name: Benin Big Top Circus
items.short_description: A traditional circus experience featuring thrilling acrobatics, hilarious clowns, and mesmerizing animal acts (ethically sourced). A spectacle for the whole family.
items.address: Ring Road, By Oba Market, Benin City

items.name: Royal Puppet Guild
items.short_description: Enchanting puppet shows telling ancient Edo folk tales and modern children's stories. Hand-crafted puppets and engaging narratives captivate young audiences.
items.address: 10 New Lagos Road, Benin City

items.name: Jester's Jamboree
items.short_description: A variety show combining circus skills, juggling, and comedic acts with a touch of puppetry. Energetic and interactive, it keeps kids on the edge of their seats.
items.address: Upper Mission Road, GRA Extension, Benin City

items.name: Ostrich Alley Puppets
items.short_description: A unique puppet theater specializing in larger-than-life puppets and engaging children's plays. Watch as giant figures come to life, telling tales of adventure.
items.address: Gapiona Estate, Off Sapele Road, Benin City

items.name: Star Gazer's Dome
items.short_description: An immersive planetarium experience designed to introduce children to the wonders of the night sky, constellations, and our solar system through engaging visuals.
items.address: University of Benin Main Campus, Ugbowo, Benin City

items.name: Cosmic Kids Journey
items.short_description: Take an interactive journey through space, learning about planets, stars, and galaxies with kid-friendly narrations and captivating projections. Perfect for budding astronauts.
items.address: Near Iyaro Motor Park, Ring Road, Benin City

items.name: Galaxy Explorer Center
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art planetarium offering virtual reality experiences of space travel and detailed explorations of distant cosmic phenomena. Great for older children.
items.address: Medical Stores Road, GRA, Benin City

items.name: Orion's Little Star Lab
items.short_description: A smaller, cozy planetarium focusing on storytelling about mythological constellations and basic celestial mechanics. Ideal for very young children.
items.address: Off Igbinedion University Road, Okada, Benin City

items.name: Jungle Quest Labyrinth
items.short_description: Navigate a thrilling outdoor labyrinth filled with puzzles, hidden clues, and physical challenges. Children work together to find their way out and complete the 'jungle quest'.
items.address: Off Boundary Road, GRA, Benin City

items.name: Ancient Benin Treasure Hunt
items.short_description: Embark on an epic treasure hunt across a simulated ancient Benin kingdom. Solve riddles related to local history and culture to uncover the hidden 'Oba's treasure'.
items.address: Egor Local Government Area, Benin City

items.name: Mystery Manor Challenge
items.short_description: An indoor adventure game set in a mysterious manor house. Kids must find clues, solve logical puzzles, and unlock secrets to complete their mission before time runs out.
items.address: Off Country Home Road, Ugbor, Benin City

items.name: Safari Scavenger World
items.short_description: A vast outdoor area designed for scavenger hunts and exploration, with themed zones representing different safari environments. Kids use maps and compasses to find items.
items.address: Ugbor-Amagba Road, Off Sapele Road, Benin City

items.name: Niger Delta Aqua World
items.short_description: Explore the rich aquatic life of the Niger Delta region, showcasing various freshwater and brackish water species. Educational exhibits teach about conservation.
items.address: By Ikpoba Hill, Benin-Agbor Expressway, Benin City

items.name: Benin Lagoon Life
items.short_description: Dedicated to the unique ecosystems found in the lagoons and coastal areas surrounding Benin City. See species like manatees, crocodiles, and various birdlife in natural habitats.
items.address: Benin-Agbor Expressway, Near Oregbeni, Benin City

items.name: Ocean Discovery Hub
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art aquarium showcasing exotic marine life from around the world. Features touch tanks, interactive displays, and daily feeding shows for an immersive experience.
items.address: River Road, Off Sakponba Road, Benin City

items.name: Freshwater Wonders
items.short_description: A smaller, focused aquarium dedicated to the incredible diversity of freshwater fish and amphibians found in local rivers and lakes. Learn about their unique adaptations.
items.address: Uselu Shell Road, Opposite Stella Obasanjo Hospital, Benin City

items.name: Anansi's Story Garden
items.short_description: A lush, green space where professional storytellers bring African folk tales, especially those of Anansi the Spider, to life under the shade of ancient trees. Interactive sessions for kids.
items.address: Off Airport Road, Near Benin Airport, Benin City

items.name: Griot's Grove
items.short_description: A cultural storytelling park where elders share traditional Edo narratives, proverbs, and songs, connecting children with their heritage in a serene, natural setting.
items.address: Off Sapele Road, After Ologbo, Benin City

items.name: Whispering Woods Tales
items.short_description: An enchanting forest-themed park where different 'story points' feature audio narratives, interactive puzzles, and costumed characters telling magical fairy tales.
items.address: Textile Mill Road, Ugbowo, Benin City

items.name: Folklore Funfair
items.short_description: Combines storytelling with carnival games and craft workshops, all themed around global folklores. Children can listen to stories then engage in activities inspired by them.
items.address: Along Auchi Road, Egor, Benin City

items.name: Benin Brick Builders
items.short_description: A massive indoor space dedicated to Lego and other building blocks. Kids can build anything imaginable, participate in building challenges, and view impressive Lego sculptures.
items.address: Murtala Muhammed Way, Off Ugbowo, Benin City

items.name: Creative Blocks Kingdom
items.short_description: An imaginative construction park with various types of building blocks, from giant soft blocks for toddlers to intricate magnetic tiles for older kids. Encourages collaborative building.
items.address: 18 Siluko Road, Benin City

items.name: Master Builder's Yard
items.short_description: An outdoor construction zone where children can use real (safe) tools and materials to build small structures, fostering practical skills and teamwork.
items.address: Aduwawa Road, Behind God is Good Motors, Benin City

items.name: Gear & Gadget City
items.short_description: A park focused on mechanical construction, with gear sets, K'nex, and robotic kits. Kids learn about simple machines and engineering principles through hands-on building.
items.address: Ekenwan Road Bypass, Opp. UNIBEN Gate 2, Benin City

items.name: Character Carnival Corner
items.short_description: Meet and greet beloved cartoon characters, take photos, and enjoy mini-shows and games. Features rotating popular characters from classic and modern cartoons.
items.address: Oba Market Road, City Center, Benin City

items.name: Toon Town Meetup
items.short_description: An interactive zone where children can high-five, dance with, and get autographs from their favorite animated mascots. Special themed events happen monthly.
items.address: Mission Road, Near St. Paul's Catholic Church, Benin City

items.name: Mascot's Manor
items.short_description: A charming manor house where storybook characters come to life for personalized meet-and-greet sessions. Children can have tea parties or participate in small games with their heroes.
items.address: Ezoti Street, Off Sakponba Road, Benin City

items.name: Friendly Faces Fiesta
items.short_description: A lively outdoor festival where multiple cartoon characters roam, interacting with guests, performing short skits, and leading parades. A vibrant and energetic experience.
items.address: Uwa Street, Off Mission Road, Benin City

items.name: Curious Kids Lab
items.short_description: An interactive science center where children can perform simple experiments, learn about physics, chemistry, and biology through hands-on activities. Led by friendly scientists.
items.address: Okhoro Road, After Textile Mill Road, Benin City

items.name: Innovation Explorers
items.short_description: Focusing on engineering and technology, this center allows kids to design, build, and test their own inventions, from simple machines to basic robotics. Inspires future innovators.
items.address: Murtala Mohammed Way, Near Ramat Park, Benin City

items.name: Young Discoverers Hub
items.short_description: A playful science center with exhibits on the human body, nature, and the environment. Features sensory experiences and interactive displays tailored for early learners.
items.address: College Road, Off Ugbowo-Lagos Road, Benin City

items.name: Edo STEM Zone
items.short_description: A comprehensive STEM center offering workshops in coding, science, technology, engineering, and math for various age groups, blending fun with critical thinking.
items.address: Benin-Auchi Road, Eyaen, Benin City
